Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: This property contains the available OEM specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

DisablePassphrase.longDescription: This action shall disaple the need for passphrases on the supplied region provided the supplied passphrase matches that of the region.

Passphrase.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the passphrase used in this action.

RegionId.description: Memory region ID for which this action to be applied.
RegionId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the Memory region ID for which this action to be applied.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.AddressParity: Address Parity errors can be corrected.
enumDescriptions.MultiBitECC: Multi-bit Data errors can be corrected by ECC.
enumDescriptions.SingleBitECC: Single bit Data error can be corrected by ECC.

Memory.description: This is the schema definition for definition of a Memory and its configuration.
Memory.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the Memory in a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: The Actions property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

AllowedSpeedsMHz.description: Speed bins supported by this Memory.
AllowedSpeedsMHz.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the speed supported by this Memory.

BaseModuleType.description: The base module type of Memory.
BaseModuleType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the base module type of Memory.

BusWidthBits.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the bus width in bits.

CapacityMiB.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the Memory capacity in MiB.

DataWidthBits.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the data width in bits.

DeviceID.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the device ID of the Memory.

DeviceLocator.description: Location of the Memory in the platform.
DeviceLocator.longDescription: The value of this property shall be location of the Memory in the platform, typically marked in the silk screen.

ErrorCorrection.description: Error correction scheme supported for this memory.
ErrorCorrection.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the error correction scheme supported for this memory.

FirmwareApiVersion.description: Version of API supported by the firmware.
FirmwareApiVersion.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the version of API supported by the firmware.

FirmwareRevision.description: Revision of firmware on the Memory controller.
FirmwareRevision.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the revision of firmware on the Memory controller.

FunctionClasses.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the function classes by the Memory.

IsRankSpareEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be true if a rank spare is enabled for this Memory.

IsSpareDeviceEnabled.longDescription: The value of this property shall be true if a spare device is enabled for this Memory.

Manufacturer.longDescription: This property shall contain a string which identifies the manufacturer of the Memory.

MaxTDPMilliWatts.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the maximum power budgets supported by the Memory in milli Watts.

MemoryDeviceType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the Memory Device Type as defined by SMBIOS.

MemoryLocation.description: Memory connection information to sockets and memory controllers.
MemoryLocation.longDescription: This object shall contain properties which describe the Memory connection information to sockets and memory controllers.

MemoryMedia.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the media types of this Memory.

MemoryType.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the type of Memory represented by this resource.

Metrics.description: A reference to the Metrics associated with this Memory.
Metrics.longDescription: A reference to the Metrics associated with this Memory.

Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.
Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.

OperatingMemoryModes.description: Memory modes supported by the Memory.
OperatingMemoryModes.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the memory modes supported by the Memory.

OperatingSpeedMhz.description: Operating speed of Memory in MHz or MT/s as appropriate.
OperatingSpeedMhz.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the operating speed of Memory in MHz or MT/s (mega-transfers per second) as reported by the memory device. Memory devices which operate at their bus speed shall report the operating speed in MHz (bus speed), while memory device which transfer data faster than their bus speed (e.g. DDR memory) shall report the operating speed in MT/s (mega-transfers/second). In any case, the reported value shall match the conventionally reported values for the technology utilized by the memory device.

PartNumber.description: The product part number of this device.
PartNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the part number as provided by the manufacturer of this Memory.

PersistentRegionSizeLimitMiB.description: Total size of persistent regions in mebibytes (MiB).
PersistentRegionSizeLimitMiB.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total size of persistent regions in MiB.

PowerManagementPolicy.longDescription: This object shall contain properties which describe the power management policy for the current resource.

RankCount.description: Number of ranks available in the Memory.
RankCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be number of ranks available in the Memory. The ranks could be used for spare or interleave.

Regions.description: Memory regions information within the Memory.
Regions.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the memory region information within the Memory.

SecurityCapabilities.description: This object contains security capabilities of the Memory.
SecurityCapabilities.longDescription: This object shall contain properties which describe the security capabilities of the Memory.

SerialNumber.description: The product serial number of this device.
SerialNumber.longDescription: This property shall indicate the serial number as provided by the manufacturer of this Memory.

SpareDeviceCount.description: Number of unused spare devices available in the Memory.
SpareDeviceCount.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the number of unused spare devices available in the Memory. If memory devices fails, the spare device could be used.

Status.description: This property describes the status and health of the resource and its children.
Status.longDescription: This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.

SubsystemDeviceID.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the subsystem Device ID of the Memory.

SubsystemVendorID.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the subsystem Vendor ID of the Memory.

VendorID.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the vendor ID of the Memory.

VolatileRegionSizeLimitMiB.description: Total size of volatile regions in mebibytes (MiB).
VolatileRegionSizeLimitMiB.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the total size of volatile regions in MiB.

MemoryLocation.description: Memory connection information to sockets and memory controllers.
MemoryLocation.longDescription: This type shall contain properties which describe the Memory connection information to sockets and memory controllers.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Channel.description: Channel number in which Memory is connected.
Channel.longDescription: Channel number in which Memory is connected.

MemoryController.description: Memory controller number in which Memory is connected.
MemoryController.longDescription: Memory controller number in which Memory is connected.

Slot.description: Slot number in which Memory is connected.
Slot.longDescription: Slot number in which Memory is connected.

Socket.description: Socket number in which Memory is connected.
Socket.longDescription: Socket number in which Memory is connected.

enumDescriptions.DRAM: The memory module is composed of volatile memory.
enumDescriptions.NVDIMM_F: The memory module is composed of non-volatile memory.
enumDescriptions.NVDIMM_N: The memory module is composed of volatile memory backed by non-volatile memory.
enumDescriptions.NVDIMM_P: The memory module is composed of a combination of non-volatile and volatile memory.

enumLongDescriptions.DRAM: This memory type shall represent volatile DRAM.
enumLongDescriptions.NVDIMM_F: This memory type shall represent NVDIMM_F as defined by JEDEC.
enumLongDescriptions.NVDIMM_N: This memory type shall represent NVDIMM_N as defined by JEDEC.
enumLongDescriptions.NVDIMM_P: This memory type shall represent NVDIMM_P as defined by JEDEC.

OemActions.description: The available OEM specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain any additional OEM actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

enumDescriptions.PMEM: Persistent memory, byte accesible through system address space.

PowerManagementPolicy.longDescription: This type shall contain properties which describe the power management policy for the current resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

AveragePowerBudgetMilliWatts.description: Average power budget in milli watts.
AveragePowerBudgetMilliWatts.longDescription: Average power budget in milli watts.

PeakPowerBudgetMilliWatts.description: Peak power budget in milli watts.
PeakPowerBudgetMilliWatts.longDescription: Peak power budget in milli watts.

RegionSet.description: Memory region information within a Memory entity.
RegionSet.longDescription: This type shall describe the memory region information within a Memory entity.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MemoryClassification.description: Classification of memory occupied by the given memory region.
MemoryClassification.longDescription: Classification of memory occupied by the given memory region.

OffsetMiB.description: Offset with in the Memory that corresponds to the starting of this memory region in mebibytes (MiB).
OffsetMiB.longDescription: Offset with in the Memory that corresponds to the starting of this memory region in MiB.

PassphraseState.description: State of the passphrase for this region.
PassphraseState.longDescription: State of the passphrase for this region.

RegionId.description: Unique region ID representing a specific region within the Memory.
RegionId.longDescription: Unique region ID representing a specific region within the Memory.

SizeMiB.description: Size of this memory region in mebibytes (MiB).
SizeMiB.longDescription: Size of this memory region in MiB.

SecureEraseUnit.description: This defines the action for securely erasing given regions using the NIST SP800-88 Purge: Cryptograhic Erase.
SecureEraseUnit.longDescription: This action shall securely erase the supplied region provided the supplied passphrase matches that of the given region using the NIST SP800-88 Purge: Cryptographic Erase. Use the OverwriteUnit method to perform NIST SP800-88 Purge: Overwrite.

Passphrase.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the passphrase used in this action.

RegionId.description: Memory region ID for which this action to be applied.
RegionId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the Memory region ID for which this action to be applied.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

SecurityCapabilities.description: This type contains security capabilities of a Memory entity.
SecurityCapabilities.longDescription: This type shall contain properties which describe the security capabilities of a Memory entity.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

MaxPassphraseCount.description: Maximum number of passphrases supported for this Memory.
MaxPassphraseCount.longDescription: Maximum number of passphrases supported for this Memory.

SecurityStates.description: Security states supported by the Memory.
SecurityStates.longDescription: Security states supported by the Memory.

enumDescriptions.Enabled: Secure mode is enabled and access to the data is allowed.
enumDescriptions.Frozen: Secure state is frozen and can not be modified until reset.
enumDescriptions.Locked: Secure mode is enabled and access to the data is locked.
enumDescriptions.Passphraselimit: Number of attempts to unlock the Memory exceeded limit.
enumDescriptions.Unlocked: Secure mode is enabled and access to the data is unlocked.

SetPassphrase.description: Set passphrase for the given regions.
SetPassphrase.longDescription: This action shall apply the supplied passphrase to the supplied region.

Passphrase.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the passphrase used in this action.

RegionId.description: Memory region ID for which this action to be applied.
RegionId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the Memory region ID for which this action to be applied.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

UnlockUnit.description: This defines the action for unlocking given regions.
UnlockUnit.longDescription: This action shall apply the supplied passphrase to the supplied region for the purpose of unlocking the given regions.

Passphrase.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the passphrase used in this actionn.

RegionId.description: Memory region ID for which this action to be applied.
RegionId.longDescription: The value of this property shall be the Memory region ID for which this action to be applied.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #Memory.v1_1_4.Memory
